duplicateCode.name: Duplicate Code
details: The same code is found in two or more places.
Can be fixed with Extract Method.

codeDeletion.name: Code Deletion
details: Can be used on Duplicate Code, Speculative Generality.

speculativeGenerality.name: Speculative Generality
details: There is an unused code segment, usually created in case a new feature is added.

shotgunSurgery.name: Shotgun Surgery
details: Changing the code requires making many small changes by hand in many places.
Can be fixed with Extract Method.

extractMethod.name: Extract Method
details: Take similar code that appears more than once and make a new method. Replace this code with calls to the new method.
Can be used on Long Method, Shotgun Surgery, Switch Statement Misuse.

switchStatementMisuse.name: Switch Statement Misuse
details: A complex system of if-statements that is hard to understand.
Can be fixed with Extract Method.

longMethod.name: Long Method
details: A method that is too long to understand easily.
Can be fixed with Extract Method.
